channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Stupidest idea’: Kevin O’Leary rips apart Dave Ramsey's advice for couples — why he thinks all women should do this
Missouri troopers arrest 84 in St. Louis highway enforcement event
Putin vows quick response if Europe provokes Russia
The government shuts down, and Trump goes online — very online
The National Hurricane Center is tracking 2 new disturbances in the Atlantic — and one could move across Florida. See the projected path and forecast.
Excavators find $1M in gold coins from shipwreck along Florida's 'Treasure Coast'
item.description: A team of excavators has found $1 million in treasure from a centuries-old Spanish shipwreck off a stretch of Florida known as the “Treasure Coast.”

item.title: From bombs to glass: Hanford site can now transform nuclear waste
item.description: The Hanford Nuclear Reservation in Washington state produced plutonium for most of America's nuclear arsenal through the end of the Cold War

item.title: Study shows the world is far more ablaze now with damaging fires than in the 1980s
item.description: A new study shows that the world's most damaging wildfires are happening four times more often now compared to the 1980s

item.title: Trump declares drug cartels operating in Caribbean unlawful combatants

item.title: Woman sues Mississippi police over son's killing
item.description: The mother of a 25-year-old Black man who was fatally shot by police in Mississippi is suing
